scripts.start: yarn build && concurrently "node scripts/build.mjs --watchChanges" "node scripts/start.mjs" "yarn copy-styles"
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn types && copyfiles ../packages/legacy-renderer/**/*.css && cd ../packages/legacy-renderer && copyfiles **/*.scss **/*.png **/*.glsl **/*.svg ../.cache/legacy-renderer && cd ../../cms && node scripts/build.mjs
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn build && node scripts/minify.mjs
scripts.build:examples: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn build && NODE_ENV=production SDK_EXAMPLE_BUILD=true node scripts/build-examples.mjs
